overview:
Rebecca is the Communications Director at 6Wunderkinder, the Berlin based startup who is behind the much loved productivity app Wunderlist.

Here, Rebecca is responsible for the overall communications strategy, along with the traditional PR work. Currently her focused (along with the rest of the 6Wunderkinder team) is on readying Wunderlist 2 for launch later this year, so watch this space!

Prior to 6Wunderkinder Rebecca worked for some of Australia’s most prestigious PR agencies, including Hill & Knowlton. During this time she has had extensive experience executing integrated communications campaigns, across PR, social media, experiential, marketing and traditional advertising.

Much of her work over the past eight years has been focused on the consumer technology industry having managed numerous successful campaigns for the likes of Sony, Sony Ericsson, Canon, TomTom and Telstra (Australiaâ€™s largest Telecommunications Network provider), just to name a few.
